attributes.additional_details:
Opened in Febuary 2008, Active Central Bulwell, is run in association with Central and currently has an extensive amount of members enjoying the excellent facilities on offer.
Unfortunately we have learned that funding for the centre will stop and the gym will close resulting in job losses. The lads at Mellish Sports Centre are all young, qualified and enthusiastic about sport and helping people in their quest for fitness.
There are many classes and with a bit of promotion I'm sure that we would be able to create an even bigger membership.
Please sign and help keep our local gym and save jobs.
